item.title: Lightbend Academy
item.description: Some notes regarding Lighbend academy at https://academy.lightbend.com/. Taking this opportunity as it is free during this summer. Hope to learn more about Akka + Actors + Streams. Hmmm… is Data Engineering something I would like to work with? :thinking: Introduction to Reactive Systems Principles: Remain responsive Lightbend All about reactive architecture. Other TODO There is a thing called Reactive Manifesto
